name: Snack Attack (HazGal)
description:
You are a raccoon named Rocket trying to gather your garbage when you're approached by a rival! Collect food, defend yourself, and attack back to stand your ground & come out victorious!

Controls: Mouse selection.

How to play: 
Select your action on screen to either collect, attack, or defend yourself against the other raccoon. Choose wisely~
- You can only attack if you have food
- You can only collect if your food container isn't full
- Defending protects you against your opponent's attack
- Collecting fills up your food storage but leaves you vulnerable to an attack
